221184.name: The Blue Book
221184.description:
From publisher blurb:

Have you ever wanted to summon up space-demons from the moon? Well, now you can. The Blue Book gives you all the information you will need to formulate your own spellbook - your own summoned minions and your own QLPTH from which to command demon armies.

Not for those who do not dare blasphemy in pursuit of Power - the Blue Book includes 5 Monster Templates & 8 New Demons - for your reckless wizard to summon.

221186.name: Gunslingers Unchained
221186.description:
From publisher blurb:

A new unchained class for you to explore - The Unchained Gunslinger!

Lord, make me fast and accurate.
Let my aim be true and my hand faster
than those who wish to harm me and mine.
Let not my last thought be “If only I had my gun”.
and Lord, if today is truly the day you are to call me home,
Let me die in a pile of brass…

-The Armed Lutheran

Does your tabletop gaming heart beat faster when you think of throwing lead with your trusty shooting iron? The gunslinger class was a revolutionary way to play, giving us a class that was eminently playable with valuable skills. But could it be more flexible, could it have more varied choices and avenues of play? You bet it could! Check out Purple Duck Games’ new Gunslingers Unchained and the new take on a player favorite. The unchained gunslinger gives a total option choice for deeds, so you can customize your lucky lead-thrower to your heart’s content. The unchained gunslinger also gets to show his stuff with the Contraptions class feature, building all sorts of clever items to get the advantage over those who are less likely to live by their wits. Legendary Classes: The Unchained Gunslinger also contains three awesome archetypes for the unchained gunslinger, the motley gunman and his mystical patched cloak, the bootleg alchemist who bolsters lead with a bit o’ magic formula, and the construct tinkerer, who keeps mechanical companions by his side. A new way to play that you are sure to enjoy!

221187.name: Witches of Porphyra
221187.description:
From publisher blurb:

“Double, double, toil and trouble, fire burn and cauldron bubble;

In Porphyra’s violet light, witchcraft will be done tonight!”

Witchcraft exists outside the more commonly understood magical practices of arcane wizards and divine clerics, tied to shadowy powers that will not reveal themselves, patrons of hidden influence and obscure purpose. On the Patchwork Planet of Porphyra, witches sometimes aid the God-proud Deists, sometimes the ancient, aboriginal Elementalists- but mostly serve their own mysterious purposes and goals, or those of their shadowy patrons! Meet these special spellcasters in Witches of Porphyra, the newest class-book from Purple Duck Games! Within this arcane tome you will find 12 new witch archetypes, like the breath-weaponed insufflator, combat-oriented warweaver, otherworldly-sensed sightless seer, and the amazing mentor, who teaches a cohort-like heir the ways of magic until he can become a Patron of witches himself! Also contained in Witches of Porphyra are 3 new familiar types, 13 new Porphyran patrons such as Beauty, Filth and Desert, 4 new familiars like the hoop snake and flying monkey, 18 new hexes including Major and Grand hexes, 9 new feats, 2 new special materials dear to witches and an exciting sample character! Packed full of material for your favorite wiccans, Witches of Porphyra from the creative crones at Purple Duck Games is the one to get right away, because at PDG, our games are what you want!

221188.name: Rise of the Elders: A Cthulhu World
221188.description:
A Tabletop Game based on the Cthulhu mythos, featuring:

- RPG-based character creation for every new game: Create your unique character each time using one of the 6 sheets (10 with the kickstarter edition), each with bonuses, maluses and a point on one feature. Will you focus on Strength, Agility or Resistance ?

- Modular Board: Create your own path, each step into the unknown could be your last, but be aware of the empty hexagons you create while building the map. Cthulhu wants them, Cthulhu wants your defeat.

- Storytelling: Each new tile is supported by a new story, each story has two choices and each of them leads to one of 6 outcomes (3 good ones, 3 bad ones) resulting in 1080 astonishing possibilities. Each choice is based on your character's features and your luck.

- Uniquely designed miniature models for every monster in the game (Heir of Cthulhu, Shub-Niggurath, Azatoth and Yog-Sothoth) and for every character.

- Enemies among Friends: In each game you play, you'll never know if the player by your side is a friend or a foe. It starts as a cooperative game, but one of your "friends" might be a cultist for one of the Ancients.

- Turn Based: You don't have much time, you need to find the site of the ritual trying to bring a Ancient Ones into our world through a portal. You only have a few turns to do it!

- Equip Yourself: As in any RPG game, your character can use weapons, like a Machinegun or an Axe, find marvellous objects, like powerful Talismans, or outlive danger through the use of protective gear.

- The Goal: If you're one of the investigators of the occult, your goal is to close all the Ancient portals, but if you're one of the cultists, your goal is to complete the ritual to bring your Ancient One on Earth.

221189.description:
This lot contains 5 Gladiator cards:

007 Zdantal
008 The Corruptor L1/L2
09 The Corruptor L3/L4
010 QuickRazor
011 Desert Aegis
221189.name: Ophidian 2360: Promo Pack 2

221190.name: Make America Debate Again
221190.description:
Description from the publisher:

Make America Debate Again is a non-political card game where you and your friends debate ridiculous, creative topics with logical or outlandish arguments.

Each player takes turns drawing topic cards which they will attempt to win based on a simple majority vote or by winning a debate against one of the other players.

First to five cards wins!

221191.name: Eastern Front
221191.description:
Conflicts: Eastern Front is a turn based strategy game set on the Eastern Front during the Second World War. A much more detailed version of Operation Barbarossa in the same series. Created by Joni Nuutinen as part of the Conflict-Series.

The player commands the Axis forces in their invasion of the Soviet Union. The AI commands the Soviet forces. The Each unit can move between 0 and 3 spaces per turn. Moving into an enemy space causes combat. Supply is critical as being cut off can lead to a slow death as Soviet forces pour through the seams in your line. Eastern Front adds rail building to the mix.

A thoroughly engrossing tablet game sure to please any wargamer.

221193.name: The Cult of Alunir
221193.description:
User summary:

The Cult of Alunir is a fan-created setting that utilizes most of the standard core materials and supplements them with additional races and other options.

221194.description:
Dinosaur Island is a game by designers Jon Gilmour (Dead of Winter, Wasteland Express Delivery Service) and Brian Lewis (Titans of Industry) and published by Pandasaurus Games (Machi Koro, Yedo, Wasteland Express Delivery Service) with amazing technicolor, ridiculously '90s artwork from Kwanchai Moriya and Peter Wocken.

In Dinosaur Island, players will have to collect DNA, research the DNA sequences of extinct dinosaur species, and then combine the ancient DNA in the correct sequence to bring these prehistoric creatures back to life. Dino cooking! All players will compete to build the most thrilling park each season, and then work to attract (and keep alive!) the most visitors each season that the park opens.

Do you go big and create a pack of Velociraptors? They'll definitely excite potential visitors, but you'd better make a large enough enclosure for them. And maybe hire some (read: a lot of) security. Or they WILL break out and start eating your visitors, and we all know how that ends. You could play it safe and grow a bunch of herbivores, but then you aren't going to have the most exciting park in the world (sad face). So maybe buy a roller coaster or two to attract visitors to your park the good old-fashioned way?
221194.name: Dinosaur Island
boardgamepodcastepisode: 28. Devon Dice Podcast part 2, Show packed full of content.
Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 039 – Top 10 Mechanisms
Episode 45 :: A Feast for Odin Review - Tantrum House Kickstarter

221195.name: Mass Combat
221195.description:
From the introduction:

The mass combat rules are designed to allow you, the DM, to determine the outcome of battles involving hundreds of combatants with a few die rolls. It also zooms down into the action with enough detail to allow player characters the chance to affect the outcome of a battle.

221196.name: R/C Stunt Copter
221196.description:
User Summary

R/C Stunt Copter is a Simulation game.

221197.name: RMS Titanic
221197.description:
User Summary

RMS Titanic is an unusual concept in that it is a simulation of a salvage company investigating the wreck of the famous ocean liner.

At your disposal is a vessel packed with salvage gear. The most important is an advanced submersible called the TSI, which is fitted with sonar, cameras, a robot arm and more.

Unfortunately this gear does not come cheap, neither are the running costs of such a challenging operation. The player must therefore court publicity through promoting discoveries in press interviews. Attracting wealthy sponsors can also help with funding.

The TSI can also bring up items found through exploring the wreck. These can either be sent to the laboratory for analysis, or sold for additional funding.

Using the TSI with it's grainy video camera to explore the vessel is therefore key to the game.

The game was advertised, but never released for the Spectrum and Amstrad.

221198.description:
You've heard of Mt. Everest, K2, and Denali but only the toughest and most courageous adventurers dare to climb 29,128 feet...to the Dicey Peaks of Yeti Mountain! It's true, the terrain is treacherous: the snow is blinding, its glaciers are sheer cliffs, and the temperature hovers at 72 degrees below zero! But the real danger is from the sinister Yetis, for they strike when least expected!

Dicey Peaks is a tile and dice game of exploration and risk-taking, featuring a balance of luck and crucial decision-making as players race to be the first to reach the flag at the summit of Yeti Mountain!
221198.name: Dicey Peaks

221199.name: Rhand Hand to Hand Damage Tables
221199.description:
From the back cover:

Have you ever wondered what a weapon actually does when you strike an opponent? What part of the body was hit and what were the physical effects of the blow? These questions are ignored by most combat systems and are at best handled by "fixes" such as critical hit rules.

Wouldn't it be nice to have a fast, simple system which accurately determines where the weapon hits and how deep it penetrates? This supplement is just that. The first and only damage system which gives the real results of a weapon blow. Not only do you know the target area hit (head, neck, body, arm, etc.) but the depth to which the weapon penetrates. Suddenly all the inaccuracies of a hit point system disappear. Critical hits, disabling injuries, broken bones, and cut arteries are all accurately, vividly portrayed. A hit no longer takes the form of vague "hit points" but is transformed into rent armor, cut flesh, and broken bones.

If you are curious . . .
If you are dissatisfied with your current rules . . .
If you demand the best . . .
Join the Revolution in Game Design and move up to the Leading Edge

221201.name: Judges Guild Journal (Issue 3 - Aug/Sep 1977)
221201.description:
Articles Include:
Jocular Judgements
Scrolls from the Archives
Tips from the Tower
Omniscient Opinions
The Power
Prodigious Platemail
Wilderness Encounter System
A Brief History of Judges Guild

221202.name: Hand to Hand Combat
221202.description:
From the back cover:

Designed for the player who wants the ultimate in realism, this supplement is a self-contained hand-to-hand combat system usable with any game. Whether in a fantasy role-playing setting, the trenches of WWI, or the jungles of Vietnam this supplement provides exciting armed and unarmed hand-to-hand combat. This revolutionary supplement combines unmatched realism with quick and easy play.

Ancient to Modern Weapons & Armor:
swords to bayonets
leather to Kevlar composite armor

Martial Arts and Brawling:
strikes, locks, pins, and throws

Anatomical Hit Locations
Realistic Armor Protection
Revolutionary Damage System




We invite you to feel reality in your gaming, to enter battles more vivid, more realistic than anything you have experienced. You will feel the exhilaration of close combat, each instant ducking, parrying, striking. Hits no longer do vague "hit points" but real damage to specific body locations.

If you are curious . . .
If you are dissatisfied with your current rules . . .
If you demand the best . . .
Join the Revolution in Game Design and move up to the Leading Edge

221203.name: Robo Do It
221203.description:
User Summary

Robo Do It is a third person puzzle game.

221204.name: Beyond Magic
221204.description:
What happens when someone has no magic in a world where everyone has it? Play this quirky, colorful 16-bit style RPG and find out!

Source: The Developer Website.

221205.name: Zup! 4
221205.description:
Minimal physical puzzle with explosions.

Source: The Developer Website.

221206.name: Coronation Street: The Mystery Of The Missing Hotpot Recipe

221207.name: Call of Cthulhu 30th Anniversary Edition
221207.description:
User Summary:

6th edition core rule set (6.1, 2011). Bound in a red leather, they are a limited edition with a numbered sticker.
Sticker states:

MISKATONIC UNIVERSITY
ORNE LIBRARY SPECIAL COLLECTION
#####
RESTRICTED!
DO NOT REMOVE FROM THIS ROOM

Has a new forward by Sandy Petersen.

221208.name: MBL Pocket Pro Tour
221208.description:
Overview:
"Are you ready to become the next Millennium Blades World Champion? In Pocket Pro Tour, take on the role of a duelist at the highest level, trying to thwart your opponents' shifting strategies to win big! Each card you draft represents a key turning point in your strategy and a critical moment in the tournament. Try to read your opponents and choose the perfect play!"

Components:
6 Character Cards
17 Strategy Cards
2 Card Effects Reference Card
1 Rules Sheet

Included in the Millenium Blades: Set Rotation Kickstarter box, this very fast and light game is played over 2 rounds of Drafting then Resolution. The goal is to is to lower your opponents life total to zero while assembling small combos in the 3 cards you draft and play each round.

Includes rules for 2-3 players, or 4 players as 2 vs 2 teams.

221210.description:
Into The Rubble offers players of Advanced Squad Leader the opportunity to do battle in cities and railroad yards. The scenarios range from 1938 to 1945 with a variety of forces including American, Chinese, German/SS, Hungarian, Japanese, Nationalist Spanish, Republican Spanish, Romanian and Russian.

Into The Rubble 2 builds on Bounding Fire Production's initial offering (Into the Rubble), adding 12 new and exciting scenarios in addition to the 8 which came in the original pack, in addition to new boards, overlays and counters. Everything from the original game is here, all known errata has been incorporated, and some of the original scenarios have been adjusted for play balance.

Into the Rubble 2 includes the following:

- 20 action-packed scenarios in full-color print
- 140 Full color, die cut 1/2" counters
- 88 Full color, die cut 5/8" counters
- 2 8"x22" geomorphic mapboards (BFP A and B)
- 1 16"x22" geomorphic double-wide mapboard (BFP DW-7)
- 1 8"x12" rubbled city overlay (BFP RC-1)
- 1 large factory overlay
- 1 sheet of debris overlays
- 1 sheet of rubble/rubbled building overlays
- Rules pages describing new terrain, including Railroad Factories, and new unit types.

Ownership of the following ASL products are required to play all 20 of the included scenarios: Beyond Valor, Yanks, Doomed Battalions, Armies of Oblivion, Red Barricades, For King and Country, Rising Sun.
221210.name: Into the Rubble 2

221211.name: Battle of Souls
221211.description:
Battle of Souls is a 2+ player trading card game. In Battle of Souls you deploy (summon) warriors of different ranks and warrior sects to drain your opponents soul points (life points) and win the game. The theme of the game carries alone with historical warriors such as Samurai, Mongolian, Roman etc..

In Battle of Souls, each player starts with 8000 life points which in our game is referred to as soul points. The objective of the game, or otherwise stated the win condition is to be the first player to reach 16000 soul points.

This is done by dealing damage to your opponent from the attacks of your deployed (summoned) warriors.

Each time your opponent takes damage of any type, including any cost to activate an effect, you gain that much SP (soul points) and vice versa.

This mechanic insures that there will always be a definite victor and never a draw game.
The second win condition is if one player runs out of cards to draw from their decks, they lose the game.

GAME FLOW:
Each player starts the game by drawing 5 cards from their deck to their hand. The first play to take a turn draws one additional card at the beginning of their turn. Each turn the player is able to deploy only one fighter (warrior, elite warrior, warlord, legendary warrior) to their side of the field. The first player to take his/her turn may not attack on that turn. The last player to draw is the first that can attack.
The fighter cards are ranked in the following order, along with deployment requirements:
Warrior > No special requirements
Elite Warrior > Tribute a warrior that has 3 kill counters on it (kill counters are gained whenever a fighter destroys another fighter in battle)
Warlord > Tribute an Elite Warrior with 5 kill counters on it
Legendary Warrior > Tribute a Warlord with 7 kill counters on it, in addition to an Elite Warrior and Warrior on your side of the field.

Equipment cards can be played face up or set face down to be used at a later time. Some are one time use and others are continuous

Tactic cards are played face down on the turn you play them from your hand and may be activated by flipping face up on any turn after they were first played as long as the effect conditions are met (if any)

Battlefield cards are played face up and only one Battlefield card can be active on the field at any time. If a Battlefield card is in play when another is played, the previous one is destroyed.

FIELD LIMITATIONS:
On the field, each player can have a maximum of 5 fighter cards in play 1 battlefield, and 6 total equipment or tactic cards

PHASES:
The game phases are as follows for each turn
Draw phase > Player draws a card
Ready phase > All fighters that are currently in rest position (This is the position a fighter is changed to after a successful attack) are switched to attack position
Main phase > Player can deploy, special deploy, activate equipment, battlefield, or previously set tactic cards as well as utilize any effects whose condition is met.
Battle phase > Player sends his/her warriors to fight
Main phase 2: do the same as the first main phase with the exception of deploying a fighter if the player already did so during the first main phase. Special deployments are limitless and can be done any number of times up to the max allows fighters in play.
End phase: player ends their turn and discards a card from their hand if they are carrying 7 or more cards in hand.

221212.name: Doodle Tanks
221212.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

From the creators of the award winning Doodle God & Doodle Devil comes a new ALL ages puzzle game with a fun historical twist.
Combine artillery and other elements to create dozens of World War II tanks and armored vehicles.
Start with four basic elements and watch your creations come alive as you create historically accurate tanks and armored vehicles that once rolled across Europe and Africa. Along the way, learn about the historic events and designers that shaped the outcome of the free world.
It’s time to go to War in Doodle Tanks!

221213.name: Doodle Mafia
221213.description:
User Summary

Doodle Mafia is a mobster/crime themed puzzle game by Joybits Ltd. Combine items to form elements. Some items have a physical type of connection while others have figurative type.

221214.name: Earth Overclocked
221214.description:
Earth Overclocked is a twin-stick shooter with rogue-like elements, set in a very distorted, unstable version of our world where trees are evil, snowmen have protruding laser blasters, and monsters from popular myths dwell underground. A scientist is trapped here after his time machine explodes while traveling back in time, and he must reassemble his machine to escape before this crazy dimension collapses under its own instability. With only 20 minutes to explore Distorted Earth, defeat boss monsters, and reclaim the pieces to the time machine, the adrenaline rush is real!

Fortunately for the Scientist, a variety of powerful weapons can be found hidden in locked chests and sold from menacing black-robed merchants, ranging from simple weapons like shotguns and boomerangs to crazy arsenal such as paintball guns, leaf magnums, and even cheese!

In true rogue-like fashion, death is permanent and means starting over, but Distorted Earth is randomized between playthroughs to give a fresh experience with every new run, and there are over 35 permanent unlockables, including new weapons, game modes, and classes.

Source: The Developer Website.

221215.name: Icy Clash
221215.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

What do you get if you mix hockey with medieval combat … Icy Clash of course!
In this creative twist on hockey, the best players need to develop their games and their villages as they rise from the junior leagues to become Champion! Become the most powerful manager in the universe as you upgrade your hockey sticks, sharpen your skates or equip your team with the rare artifacts. But be prepared the opposing teams are preparing to raid your villages. Icy Clash introduces the next generation of hockey… medieval style!

Multiplayer online game for Android!
Free updates with new missions and elements!
Battle other players LIVE!
Ally with other players and build different facilities to make you stronger!
Enjoy gorgeous graphics!
Get real time updates!
Cross your fans to other players’ matches of your clan and league!
Get trophies between matches!
Take part in the interesting tournaments to gain exclusive prices!

221216.name: The Surprising Adventures of Munchausen
221216.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

The Heart of the Kingdom has been destroyed and now it’s up to Munchausen to save the day in The Surprising Adventures of Munchausen! With the light and prosperity of his kingdom gone, the king has no choice but to marry his daughter to an unknown stranger in exchange for a huge sum of money. Sensing the stranger’s evil, she writes to Munchausen who must now stop the wedding inThe Surprising Adventures of Munchausen!

Dozens of unique mini-games
Challenging brain-teasers
Association-based hidden object search
Beautiful animation
Restore the Heart of the Kingdom!

221217.name: The Great Unknown:  Houdini's Castle
221217.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Your honeymoon is cut short when your plane crashes on an uncharted island in The Great Unknown: Houdini’s Castle. You awake to discover a madman has kidnapped your husband. To get him back, you’ll have to use all your wits to pass his sinister tests and solve the mysteries of Houdini’s castle. Along the way, you’ll uncover Houdini’s secret past and learn about the brilliant apprentice who changed his life. Can you expose Houdini’s greatest trick to save your husband and escape the island? Take the challenge in this thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game.

2 search modes and over 300 hidden items
60 vivid and mystifying locations
Dozens of fascinating mini-games
Rare videos and historical documents
Collector’s Edition: bonus chapter, colorful images for your desktop, original music and concept-art from the game!

221218.name: Cassandra's Journey:  The Legacy of Nostradamus
221218.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Cassandra’s Journey: The Legacy of Nostradamus puts you in the role of Cassandra, a young mystic relying on a mysterious ring to solve cases that are assumed to be impossible. One day, her magical ring goes missing. Now it is up to you, with the help of the spirit of Nostradamus and unique mind-reading magic tricks and fortune-telling wisdom, to find the missing ring and help Cassandra reveal the secrets of her family, before they are forever lost!

Animated cutscenes
Mind-reading magic tricks!
Fun for the whole family

221219.name: Solitaire Mystery:  Stolen Power
221219.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

The oldest deck of cards in the world has been stolen from the Museum of Ancient History. These mysterious cards are so powerful that they can withstand all the evil forces. But on one condition: not a single card should be missing from the deck. Now the cards that contain the unfathomable wisdom of the past and omnipotent knowledge of the future are scattered all around the city and it is up to you to find each card to create a deck before they fall into the hands of the villain. Save the world while enjoying an exciting mix of hidden object and solitaire!

Enjoy a unique combination of hidden object and solitaire
Experience two types of solitaire
Play four different kinds of cartomancy
Unravel the mystery behind each card
Choose a solitaire-only mode

221220.name: Solitaire Mystery:  Four Seasons
221220.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Time has stopped in the City of Magic Cards. This curse is the eery punishment, imposed by the wise Nature for greed and avidity of the city inhabitants. Now it is always Autumn in the rainy neighbourhood of Spades. Clubs are frozen by the never ending Winter. Hearts have stopped, waiting in vain for the flowers to blossom with endless Spring, and Diamonds pine away under the scalding Summer sun. You are the only one who can save the magic land! Try tons of different solitaire layouts, solve dozens of unique puzzles and make the Magic City clock work again!

Over 100 different layouts
Enjoy a unique combination of hidden object and solitaire
Experience two types of solitaire
Play four different kinds of cartomancy
Choose a solitaire-only mode

221221.name: Mahjong Secrets
221221.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

If you only knew how hard is the life of a princess! She needs to constantly worry about the inhabitants of the kingdom, to solve many problems and find a way out of the most unlikely situations. In addition to all this, just this morning the princess learned that she has a twin sister. She was kidnapped many years ago, so, now it’s time to go look for her! Princess takes on a journey the Mahjong game, which can help to open any royal secrets!

100+ mahjong layouts
Bright association-based hidden object scenes
Fun quests and mini-games
Mysterious story with happy ending
Choose a mahjong-only mode

221222.name: The Plane Game
221222.description:
The object of this math-game is to stay in the air, avoid the thunderclouds while collecting as many golden points as possible.

On your turn you roll dice to gather lift-points which you need to keep your plane in the air. You´ll have to gain altitude by spending lift points or save points by descending. But beware, if you drop of the board the game is over. It will get increasingly harder to stay in the air. With every level the amount of lift points needed to gain altitude rises.

The goal in Solo play is to beat the game, level 13, with as many golden points as possible. In a multiplayer game, the player who stays in the air the longest time is the winner.

221223.name: Zombie Vikings
221223.description:
From the creators of indie smash hit Stick It to The Man! comes a new one to four-player co-op stab-you-in-the-gut-a-thon. Embark on a dead funny adventure with the Zombie Vikings. A putrid posse sent on a mission through the most epic of worlds to retrieve Odin’s lost eye.

Play as the most fearsome Vikings ever raised from Norse soil – Gunborg, Seagurd, Hedgy and Caw-kaa. Hack through the gingerbread swamps of Molgaga! Cruise through the intestines of the Midgaard Serpent! Fight giant poultry!

Source: The Game Website.

221224.name: Valdisfjell - Great Hall
221224.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Dwarven Hold of Valdisfjell, deep beneath the Old Mountain, has a long and glorious history. The Dwarves feast for days on end, and the Great Hall echoes with the sound of laughter, daring tales and melancholic songs.

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 20 x 20 battlemap depiciting the Great Hall of a Dwarven Hold. Feast tables, the Lord's Table and the homes of richer residents, the map builds with others in the Valdisfjell range to make a large Dwarven Hold.

221225.name: Valdisfjell - Housing District
221225.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Dwarven Hold of Valdisfjell, deep beneath the Old Mountain, has a long and glorious history. The Dwarves here live in communal housing districts, with shared areas for eating and leisure, and large dormitories where several families live alongside each other.

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 20 x 20 battlemap depiciting a Dwarven housing district within a subterranean Hold. Bedrooms, dining areas, supplies and communal dormitories make up the area. The map builds with others in the Valdisfjell range to make a large Dwarven Hold.

221226.name: Valdisfjell - The West Door
221226.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Dwarven Hold of Valdisfjell, deep beneath the Old Mountain, has a long and glorious history. Guarding the approach from the outside world, the West Door opens for friends, but remains firmly closed against enemies of Valdisfjell.

A printable battlemap compatible with any RPG/Dungeon-Crawl game. Use as a standalone gameboard, or combine with any same-scale tileset.

Contents: A 20 x 20 battlemap depiciting the entrance doorway to a Dwarven Hold. A bridge spans a chasm in a cavern, before meeting the imposing facade of the Hold. The map builds with others in the Valdisfjell range to make a large Dwarven Hold.

221227.name: Hearths and Homes
rpg: Beyond the Wall and Other Adventures
221227.description:
From publisher blurb:

A free addon for Beyond the Wall and Other Adventures centered on the characters’ home village.

Sugestions for expanding your village, its customs, and the folk that live there.
The Troubled Village, a new Scenario Pack.
The Wicked Tradesmen, a new Threat Pack.
The Adventurous Trader, a new Character Playbook.

221228.name: Contagion's Kiss
221228.description:
From publisher blurb:

"O true apothecary, thy drugs are quick. Thus with a kiss I die."

— Romeo, in Romeo and Juliet, by William Shakespeare

When the city's water supply is threatened by extortionists, the heroes are called on to infiltrate the fortress of a powerful outsider. Can they get in, get even, and get out, before it’s too late?

Contagion's Kiss is an adventure for a party of 4th level characters. It can be used in any fantasy city or town where wells or cisterns are the main source of water. The Pathfinder Roleplaying Game GameMastery Guide and Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Bestiary are required for play. This adventure includes creatures detailed in Chilling Curiosities — A Field Guide.

221229.name: Arvan: The Land of Dragons
rpg: Dice & Glory: The Ultimate Role-Playing Game
221229.description:
From publisher blurb:

Arvan: The Land of Dragons, a dark fantasy campaign setting for Dice & Glory, centers on the Age of Adventure and a burgeoning international trade and era of conquest. As well as the reclamation of territory from the supernatural forces that have dominated it for so long and which had resulted from an extended Dark Age of Mad Mage-Lords and Dark Warlords. In the East an ancient empire struggles to slow its disintegration into smaller feudal princedoms as its central theocracy seizes power for itself also trying to focus the chaos on the empires former colonies in the West. Power is up for grabs for those willing to seize it.

221230.name: Farlight
boardgamepodcastepisode: 29 Devon Dice podcast The Rising Xan,
221230.description:
Description by the publisher:

FORGING THE FUTURE
In the near future, talented space corporations and agencies set out to explore, mine, and colonize outer space. Your organisation will compete to design the most efficient and powerful spacecraft, to gather scientific knowledge, construct facilities on distant worlds, and transport colonists to the farthest reaches of our Solar System. Charge up the monster rocket boosters, crew up, and race for space!

Designed by King's Forge designer Nick Sibicky, Farlight is a well-oiled game of blind bidding, tile placement, and light resource management. Each turn players will make bids for spacecraft module designs or missions, and assemble spacecraft designed to complete missions of increasing difficulty. The game is for 2-5 players, and plays in around 45 minutes.

221231.name: Young at Heart
221231.description:
A Sports Drama Storygame

Publisher's blurb:

In this roleplaying game you and some friends are going to work semi-cooperatively to get an all-star ball player through the most difficult, and maybe the most defining day of their life.

Young at Heart does not concern itself with simulating the game of baseball. Instead, it focuses on getting into the headspace of the pitcher and what they are going through on the mound in order to keep throwing that ball, and throwing it well. What do they think about? How does it feel? Where does their inner strength come from?

As you experience the inner struggles of this individual, know that you’ll also be carving out a future for them as well as creating their past memories. Collaboratively, you’ll be defining the moments of a person who has given their life to a game they’ve played ever since they first put on a glove and began to play catch. All in order to see where they end up after one of the hardest days of their lives.

221232.description: A kickstarter-exclusive expansion optional add on. It includes the Steampunk Twilight Knight crossover character who is from the Kingdom Death: Monster game. Also included in this expansion is a model of the character as well as her own dashboard and card.
221232.name: The World of SMOG: Rise of Moloch – Kingdom Death Crossover: Steampunk Twilight Knight

221233.name: Star Cartel
221233.description:
It's time to ditch this dingy cantina because you're ready to make it big. Welcome to the Star Cartel.

The black market's a tricky business, and now that you've joined the Star Cartel, you'll need to play it smart. Every shipment you make will let you stash some contraband for yourself and will earn you a new ship, but with every fresh delivery the Cartel's prices change. Will you risk it all on illicit plants, plan to convey a careful mix of med-kits and energy crystals, or rush to deliver as quickly as possible to get that special ship? Don't push too hard or the price will fall faster than re-entry to atmosphere, and your hopes will fall with it.

Load your ship with available goods and once your ship is full, the goods shipped will modify their own value. Each time you deliver goods, your ship upgrades to the next highest capacity ship. In the end, the player who stashed the most luxurious goods wins.

221234.name: Time Traveller (1989)
221234.description:
From cassette inlay
From the future ruled by an evil dictator, you have been sent back in time by your resistance movement to try and alter the political balance of your own age. You have agreed to be trapped in a timewarp loop, in each of three eras for your cause, the gaining of a stable political climate for your pepe. You miust alter the balance of power during the three wars which happened in your past. You have been given a portable warp generator which will automatically transport you to the next age to engage in your task. This takes a little while to recharge before warping, so your job is to do as much damage to the enemy as you can in your stop at that time. If you fail, and let the situation reach the point at which historians say that the balance was altered, your generator will fail, and your will be stuck in that time, for the rest of your life.

221235.name: Deck of Many Things
221235.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Standard 22 card deck, fully illustrated with the spell effects listed at the bottom of each card.

In the world of fantasy RPG’s The Deck of Many Things is a powerful magical artifact with a dubious reputation. It made it’s first appearance in Dungeons & Dragons' first supplement, Greyhawk, in 1975 and has since appeared in every edition of the Dungeon Masters Guide.

The Deck appears to be a simple deck of tarot cards with anywhere from 13 - 22 cards. Each card causes a distinct magical effect on the person who draws from the deck. Some of these effects are quite helpful to the players, others are extremely dangerous.

For use with any edition of the d20 system.

221236.name: Deck of Many Things 0th Edition
221236.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Deck of Many Things as it first appeared in the OD&D Greyhawk Supplement. Contains 18 cards for use with any edition of the d20 system.

221237.name: Deck of Many More Things
221237.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Deck of Many More Things is a 28 card expansion to our classic Deck of Many Things. Each of these full-color art cards feature a brand new spell effect to make your game come alive. The deck can also be used as a stand along magic item, and it's far less deadly and gamebreakinig compared to it's gygaxian cousins.

221238.name: Deck of Even More Things
221238.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Deck of Even More Things is an All new Expansion to our Deck of Many Things. This deck features 20 all new spell effects for your deck or to be used as a stand alone deck for your game.

221239.name: Galactic Civilizations III - Altarian Prophecy
221239.description:
Lead the newly founded Terran Alliance in its first encounter with the Altarian Confederation. You must forge an alliance and unite with them in order to combat the terrifying threats of the Drengin Empire and the Dominion of the Korx. But, beware - just as victory seems within your grasp, an even deadlier threat emerges from the shadows to try and take it away.

Features:

| Discover the story of the alliance between mankind and the Altarians during a new campaign. Spanning 3 missions, you must do whatever it takes to overcome the Dominion of the Korx and their mysterious masters, the Drath.

| Customize your ships with classic ship styles! This DLC includes the Drath, United Earth, and Korx styles.

| Explore dozens of classic ship parts and build some of your favorite Galactic Civilizations II ships.

Source: The Developer Website.

221240.name: High Fantasy Magic
221240.description:
From publisher blurb:

High Fantasy Magic is a simple, freeform magic system designed for Fate Core and Fate Accelerated. Its goal is to be a drop-in magic system with a high fantasy tone while sticking closely to Fate Core and providing the same amount of flexibility in character creation and progression. There are no spell lists. Instead, the players can choose which types of magic they can use via a list of magic disciplines. Then, the players are encouraged to use the power they have in whatever creative ways they can think of. The freeform nature of this magic system allows for simple adjudication of the rules and a low barrier to entry. Whether you use it in it's entirety or pick it apart as a toolkit, this is a great resource for magical, fantasy settings.

221244.description: This Shiny Token Set for use with Firefly: The Game contains 40 upgraded cargo hold tokens - enough to outfit one player's ship. These upgraded tokens are durable full-color laser-cut acrylic with felt-backs. Includes: Passengers, Fugitives, Cargo, Contraband, Fuel and Parts.
221244.name: Firefly: The Game – Cargo Hold Shiny Token Set

221245.name: Smoothie Kaboom!
221245.description:
Description from the publisher:

Smoothie Kaboom is a kickstarter promotional collaboration between Minion Games and Thunderworks Games, combining the components of Blend Off! and Cosmic Kaboom into a third, hybrid game that plays like a combination of the two.

In Smoothie Kaboom, players will race their ships around the galaxy to collect fruit from different planets to create smoothies. Players take turns flicking their ships. If they collide with a planet that is currently producing, they can collect the fruit. When they have the right fruit to complete a smoothie order, they return to their base to cash in for points. The game ends when all smoothie orders have been filled. The winner is the one with the most gold stars.

221248.name: Monikers: The Shut Up & Sit Down Nonsense Box
boardgameintegration: Monikers
Monikers
boardgamepodcastepisode: #40: A Feast for Odin six-pack; Burger Up on tap; New York Slice & More
28. Devon Dice Podcast part 2, Show packed full of content.
221248.description: The Shut Up & Sit Down Nonsense Box is a standalone expansion for Monikers. It features 112 cards, written by the folks at Shut Up & Sit Down.

221251.name: Blade Bind
221251.description:
(publisher blurb)

Blade Bind is a storygame of sword-powered tragedy. Become one of the Chosen, wield an ancient supernatural Blade, and fight to secure your goals while struggling to maintain control!

Blade Bind is GMless, designed for one-shots, and uses a pack of regular playing cards to resolve duels using a system inspired by real-world swordfighting experience.

221252.name: The Death Jade (Fate)
221252.description:
From publisher blurb:

A mysterious client offering a lot of money. A missing Russian noble. An ancient jade said to hold the spirit of the First Sovereign Emperor of China...

Through the sordid streets of 1936 Shanghai -- the Paris of the Orient -- the characters follow the footsteps of Count Rusikov, a refugee from the Bolshevik Revolution and archaeologist, to find the legendary Donguin Jade, a priceless artifact of Chinese history. But they are not alone -- Japanese agents, communist assassins, and provincial warlords stand between you and the prize!

This adventure module is powered by the FATE role playing system.

221253.name: The Death Jade (Ubiquity)
221253.description:
From publisher blurb:

A mysterious client offering a lot of money. A missing Russian noble. An ancient jade said to hold the spirit of the First Sovereign Emperor of China...

Through the sordid streets of 1936 Shanghai -- the Paris of the Orient -- the characters follow the footsteps of Count Rusikov, a refugee from the Bolshevik Revolution and archaeologist, to find the legendary Donguin Jade, a priceless artifact of Chinese history. But they are not alone -- Japanese agents, communist assassins, and provincial warlords stand between you and the prize!

This adventure is powered by the Ubiquity role playing system and is compatible with Hollow Earth Expedition.

221254.name: Hero Realms: Captain Koska Promo Card
221254.description:
Promotional card that came with the Hero Realms Legion Cardbox (1 copy)

Captain Koska
Champion - Human Mercenary
Cost 4
Unaligned - No Ally Ability
Combat 3 - Guard 4
Expend Ability: Choose a faction. Captain Koska has that faction this turn.

221255.name: BMX Trials
221255.description:
From cassette cover
You have been seleted to enter the Earth's most exciting BMX trials. There are six amazing tests of skill. Bea the qualifying scores and stay in the competition to challenge for the world's records.
1. 200 m Race - Race the computer th the finishing line avoiding the rocks, puddles of water and bumps in the track. Beware of wobble at low speeds.
2. Wheelie - Pedal as fast as you can and pull a wheelie at the line. See if you can beat the record by holding it as long as possible.
3. Ramp Jump - Approach the ramo as fast as you can, make sure you are in line, then watch yourself soar through the air to qualify for the next test of skill.
4. Slalom - Nothing byr deadly accuracy and speed will allow you to qualify by going through the gates and fences. It will help to use your breaks in this section
5. Bunny Hops - You might have to go a bit slower on this, hop on the bars but be careful you don't collect too many penalty points.
6. Beetle Ride - The final test. You will see the people's wagon in the distance but you will have to build up a tremendous amount of speed to jump over the car.

221256.name: Mahjong Miner
221256.description:
User Summary

Free Mahjong Solitaire tile game with a mining theme. Over 1000 Mahjong puzzles to solve of varying difficulty. Solve each region's puzzles. Free to play in the Google Play store.

221257.name: Tripeaks Solitaire
221257.description:
User Summary

Classic Tripeaks Solitaire game with a soccer theme with over 100 solvable levels.

221260.name: Spider Solitaire
221260.description:
User Summary

Classic Spider Solitaire game with a soccer theme.

221261.name: Sudoku Fruit
221261.description:
User Summary

Classic Sudoku game with over 1000 solvable levels in the theme of fruit and cute animals.

221262.name: Solitaire Classic
221262.description:
User Summary

Classic Solitaire game in a soccer theme.

221263.name: Space Invaders Dice!
221263.description: The Space Invaders are back in a brand new format! Space Invaders Dice! is a fun fast-paced tabletop game that plays just like the classic arcade game. Play solo or compete against up to three others for the record high-score. Grab your six-sided arsenal and save the planet before it's too late!

221264.name: Ooblets
221264.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





WHAT IS OOBLETS????? YOU MIGHT ASKOoblets is a currently-in-development creature collection and farming game. It’s sort of like Harvest Moon meets Pokémon meets Animal Crossing meets the weird awkward people we are.

MECHANICS? OKAY.
Plant, water, and harvest crops, manage and expand your farm, collect all sorts of junk, make friends, and also make littler friends (ooblets).
Use the crops you grow to befriend, upgrade, and heal ooblets. Buy a little shop and sell your excess crops and junk to the townspeople.
Explore regions like the Mamoonia desert, the spooky Nullwhere, bustling Hubton, and more! Discover loads of ooblets and battle other trainers all over the place.
SOME FEATURES:
Live a simple life working the land (and battling magical creatures)
You get a little house you can decorate and expand
Play at your own pace. Leave the stresses of city living behind you
Take part in a bustling little town full of characters
Open world exploring
Visit a variety of regions (one will be under water I think!)
Automate production with things like sprinklers
Run a shop!
Upgrade your dudes because I guess they’re not good enough for you
Maybe you will get to name your dudes too?
Join an Ooblet club. Feel wanted and appreciated. Distrust other clubs’ members.

Source: The Game Website.

rpgseries: Southlands: Adventures Beneath the Pitiless Sun
221265.name: Last Gasp
221265.description:
From the back cover:

Crack Open the Tomb, and Awaken Ancient Curses!

Come, friends, and shake the desert from your hair! The chill of night falls swiftly upon the dunes, and we should keep the darkness at bay together. Ah, you have a discerning eye! This is the seal of an ancient king, uncovered by a terrible sandstorm. Shall I tell you of the folly of Menet-Ka and of those who breathed their last in his service?

Last Gasp is an adventure set in the Southlands Campaign Setting, exploring the cursed tomb of an ancient king of great magical power, a magical river, and including both deadly combats and mysteries to confound tomb-robbers. It’s designed for five or six 6th-level characters using the 5th Edition rules and includes two entirely new monsters, the rotting wind and the anubian, presented with complete 5th Edition stats.

Seek out the riches of a king, and may fortune favor you!

221266.name: Cat Girl Without Salad: Amuse~Bouche
221266.description:
Cat Girl Without Salad: Amuse-Bouche is the first taste of an exciting new game franchise. Follow Kebako, a cat-eared intergalactic bounty hunter, as she patrols the galaxies with her faithful companion (Squiddie) in search of ridiculous space criminals. The game combines classic shmup shooting with additional genres like puzzle, sports, arcade, platformer, rhythm, driving, and RPG. Take on the galaxy’s worst in a hilarious action shooter unlike anything you’ve ever played before!

A Humble Bundle Exclusive in July 2016’s Humble Bundle Monthly!

Source: The Publisher Website.

221267.name: Descendants
221267.description:
Descendants, the Official Mobile Game inspired by the hit movie on Disney Channel!

Join Mal, Evie, Jay, Carlos and more of your favorite VKs and AKs for a wickedly fun adventure in the world of Descendants! Create your own stylish avatar, discover magical quests and unlock new locations to become a legend at the prestigious Auradon Prep!

A Wi-Fi connection is required the first time you download the game and 520 MB of free storage is required.

SHOW YOUR STYLE – Create your own unique character and stand out from the crowd with MILLIONS of fashionable combinations. Dress Auradon preppy or edgy isle, you decide!

COMPLETE MISSIONS – Organize school parties with Mal, tailor costumes with Evie for a play, and unveil more exciting quests with the help of the coolest students at Auradon Prep!

BE A LEGEND – Collect special rewards to raise your school spirit and grow your ‘Legendary’ status!

EXPLORE AURADON – Ride on Ben’s scooter to travel between locations and uncover iconic areas such as the Tourney Field, Gallery of Villains, Carnival Grounds and many more!

BUILD FRIENDSHIPS – Meet new Descendants to expand your contact list and form long-lasting friendships!

Source: The Developer Website.

221268.name: Adventure Time Puzzle Quest
221268.description:
Join Finn, Jake, and friends in a radical new journey through the Land of Ooo and encounter baddies attacking from every direction in the very first Adventure Time match-3 puzzle experience. Complete super cool battles and heroic quests to level-up characters, learn new abilities, and acquire new loot. Select your favorite Adventure Time characters in more than 30 magical and fun-filled quests and daily events, and compete in awesome tournaments for some super cool prizes! Brand new fun-filled adventures will greet you each week!

FEATURES
ADVENTURE TIME MEETS PUZZLE QUEST!
The original match-3 RPG™ comes to the Land of Ooo in Adventure Time Puzzle Quest! Join Finn, Jake, and their friends for epic puzzle battles! Match gems to attack your enemies and earn piles of loot.
ALGEBRAIC QUESTS!
The Ice King’s got a rat problem. Princess Bubblegum needs saving. And Flame Princess is ready to declare war! Go on rad quests and help the residents of Ooo by teaming up with your Adventure Time friends!
COLLECT YOUR FAVORITE PEEPS!
Recruit and collect characters like Marceline, BMO, Princess Bubblegum, Flame Princess, Gunter, and more! Each hero has mathematical special abilities that can pummel the baddies. Gain XP and level up to launch even more devastating attacks!
CRAFT POWERS AND JUNK!
Need a boost in battle? Grab Finn’s Flute or a Monster Heart Cup Cake! Craft special food items and magic potions that can help you win the fight!
MATCH MAGICAL GEMS
Match three or more gems to attack and use your abilities, but beware, the baddies have a few tricks up their sleeve to make your match-making life difficult. Get ready to become the ultimate hero!
PLAY IN TOURNEYS
Think you’re ready for the big leagues? Join in regular tournaments and special events for a chance to win special prizes and items!
Source: The Developer Website.

221269.name: Watch Quest!
221269.description:
Get ready for WATCH QUEST! – the first adventure game made exclusively for Apple Watch!

WATCH QUEST! spans both the iPhone and the Apple Watch. The iPhone is used as your Kingdom. In your kingdom you can recruit an adventurer, equip him or her with items and select a quest! Once a quest is selected you use your Apple Watch for the journey! Guide your hero through the lands, choosing his or her path and smiting enemies as you go!

There are two ways to adventure: equip your hero beforehand for passive play or forage for items on the go. With a simple glance at your watch your adventurer could even land some gold! Unlock additional fan favorite characters and even meet new heroes along the way.

Your WATCH QUEST! is about to begin! Don’t miss it!

Source: The Developer Website.

221271.name: Dusty Revenge: Co-Op Edition
221271.description:
Consumed for revenge after the love of his life is killed, Dusty crosses paths with 2 unlikely allies who are each seeking out the same enemy for a different reason. As the three set out to destroy the responsible band of villains and anyone else that stands in their way, they unravel a scheme much bigger than their personal vendettas.

Play as Dusty, a vicious multi gun wielding madman that boasts intense melee attacks. Players can also call upon two support characters, Rondel the artillery support who tramples enemies with a massive arsenal of weaponry and beastly rocket launchers, and McCoy the sharpshooter who takes down loads of enemies stealthily with his deadly accurate rifle.

Venture through cavernous wastelands, western ghost towns and deadly jungle environments in your quest for blood. You never know what to expect from the each of the unique and precarious worlds!A whole slew of enemies are out there ready to kill. From aggressive predatory vermin, vicious stalking felines, venomous mechanical snakes and giant armored gorillas, all run by the enigmatic leader Craven.

Source: The Developer Website.

221272.name: Til Morning's Light
221272.description:
Erica Page is an ordinary teenage girl, just trying to fit in. She’s also trapped in a mansion haunted by a 200 year-old curse. You know, the normal stuff. Help her explore the huge, creepy, and not exactly empty mansion, revealing its darkest secrets and hopefully a way out. There are clues to decipher, tools to collect, and puzzles to solve. If all else fails, Erica can beat the goo out of supernatural nasties with an arsenal of clubs, knives, and swords. Oh, did we forget to tell you? Erica has to escape by dawn, or she’ll become the next ghost in the mansion!

Source: The Developer Website.

221273.name: Zombie Hour
221273.description:
A Game of Survival in the Zombie Apocalypse

From the introduction:

The apocalypse has come. The dead have risen. Time is running out for the human race. Only a few survive. Against a rising tide of zombies, a small group of stubborn humans spitefully carries on, scavenging the ruins of the city looking for supplies to bring back to their fortified base where they hide from death.

But for how long?

Time, not the undead, is your greatest enemy.

User summary:

The game is played in turns, with each player moving first and the zombies appearing and moving in an end-of-turn phase. Characters have several tracked attributes. The map of the area is developed during play by placing cards. Game time is limited to one hour. Victory is collaborative and depends on accomplishing certain scavenge and survival goals before time expires. A separate, optional, rating method is provided to determine "who on your team finishes on top", in the case of victory.

The game document includes several pages of print-and-play components.

221275.name: Geology Business
221275.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Geology Business is the second game released by Svantech Studios on XBLIG, a small but fun game about mining different rocks and minerals.

221276.name: Westward Play Sheets
rpg: Westward: A Steampunk Western Roleplaying Game
221276.description:
User summary:

The publisher makes available free downloads of thirteen separate PDF files intended for use as print-and-play components. These include:


4-Page PDF Character Sheet (A/B/C/D)
1-Page PDF Character Sheet A
1-Page PDF Character Sheet B
1-Page PDF Character Sheet C
1-Page PDF Character Sheet D
1-Page PDF Vehicle Sheet A
1-Page PDF Vehicle Sheet B
1-Page PDF Vehicle Sheet C
1-Page PDF Vehicle Sheet D
1-Page PDF Mech Sheet A
1-Page PDF Mech Sheet B
1-Page PDF Mech Sheet C
1-Page PDF Mech Sheet D


The 4-Page character sheet document contains the four individual character sheets (Format A, B, C, and D).

The A and B formats of all documents have a full-color background; the C and D formats of all documents are printer-friendly with no background. The A and C formats of all documents are "right-hand" oriented; the B and D formats of all documents are "left-hand" oriented.

221277.description:
The DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Kid Flash oversized hero card was initially available as a promotional card for First Edition versions of Cryptozoic Entertainment's DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Teen Titans. This card can be mixed with any of the other hero cards in the game to give players one more choice when choosing heroes before starting to play.

As with every other hero, Kid Flash grants a special ability to the player, which in this case is: "Whenever you buy or gain a card, you may add the top card of the main deck to the Line-Up."
221277.name: DC Comics Deck-Building Game: Kid Flash

221278.name: Hollow Knight
videogamehonor: 2017 SXSW Gamer's Voice: Best Indie Game of the Year (Single player) Nominee
221278.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

In Hollow Knight, explore and fight your way through a beautiful, ruined world of insects and heroes. Challenge monstrous foes, meet strange characters and uncover hidden secrets in an adventure that combines traditional 2D animation and fluid, skillful gameplay.

221279.description:
Description from the publisher:

Go Fish Fitness is a game based around the classic game Go Fish, it is a card game for kids to encourage them to get up, jump around, and add a component of physical exercise to their game in a fun and competitive way. Each card denomination includes a quick physical exercise, and players compete to make a match and force their opponents to do the activity.

In addition to exercises, each card includes an animal or a creature so that younger children, and those with limited mobility can participate by mimicking the shown creature when a match is made.

Go Fish Fitness is based around the same set of cards as a standard deck, and can be incorporated into many other standard card games as well. Keeping fit is about incorporating exercise into everyday life, in ways both big and small, and Go Fish Fitness is a way to introduce a little bit more exercise into a normally passive activity for your kids!
221279.name: Go Fish Fitness

221280.name: Vaccine
221280.description:
Find a vaccine for your infected friend before the time runs out, but be aware your friend will relapse sooner or later, and you will have to find a new vaccine in a new randomly rebuilt house. Will you be able to uncover the mystery to save your friend once and for all!?

Source: The Publisher Website.

221281.name: Symphony of Pain
221281.description:
A board game originally published in Games Workshop's White Dwarf magazine (2014 issue #34 of White Dwarf.)

In the dark, unseen dungeons of Commorragh Haemonculus Covens gather to celebrate the perfection of pain in brutal contests against one another. These affairs are brutal and bloody, but for the lords of torture and rejuvenation, every new sensation is one to be cherished.

Symphony of Pain is a game for 2-4 players where each player controls a small team of five Wracks and a Haemonculus in a fight to inflict the most pain on the enemy.

There are two ways to win Symphony of Pain: eliminate all of the opposing models or gain enough pain points to declare yourself the winner.

221282.name: Ethereal Legends
221282.description:
A powerful foe has descended upon the world of Arcadia. The Ethereal Knights, protectors of the realm, have nearly all been destroyed. Only you remain. Enter the portal and defend the Ethereal Realms from the evil which plagues them.

Source: The Developer Website.

221283.name: Virus Crashers
221283.description:
The retro magic of the NES-era has returned! 99 tough stages will recall the feeling of childhood days.Be careful when playing Virus Crashers, and don't get too addicted!

Source: The Developer Website.

221284.description:
A Narrative-Focused Universal Role-Playing System

From the introduction:

[%] is a role-playing system designed to find a balance between narrative freedom, mechanical balance, and ease-of-use. With simple, intuitive core mechanics backed up with loads of options, this light-weight system puts story first while still allowing for balanced protagonists and legitimate threats and obstacles.

• Intuitive, percentage-based core mechanic that applies to all actions means you'll never have to look up special case rules and can stay focused on what matters: the story.

• Flexible, trait-based character creation allows players to create any protagonist they can imagine.

• "Special Effects" system allows for players to suspend or bend the rules, alter the outcome of their actions, and take control of the story.

• Wide variety of option rules allow you to customize the system to perfectly fit your game.

221285.name: 911 Operator
221285.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

911 OPERATOR is a game about the difficult work of people that manage emergency lines and services. Main task is to answer incoming calls and to react properly ­- give first aid instructions, advise, dispatch correct number of firemen / police / ambulances , or sometimes ­ just ignore the call.

KEY FEATURES

- Over 50 different voiceovered dialogs based on true events:­ sometimes serious and dramatic, sometimes funny or irritating
- Real First Aid Instructions and procedures
- Option to download and play on ANY REAL CITY in the world!
- 6 carefully prepared cities in campaign mode with specific events.

OTHER FEATURES

- Over 140 types of generated reports
- 12 types of emergency vehicles, including helicopters, vans, trucks and motorbikes
- Easily extendable by new dialogs

221286.name: IDENTECO Core Rule Book
221286.description:
IDENTECO is a tabletop RPG about how individual and corporate marketing can influence the world in positive or negative ways. The game is inspired by the cyberpunk works of William Gibson, Phillip K. Dick, and Neal Stephenson. Films like Ghost in the Shell, Total Recall, and Blade Runner, where players engage in elaborate deception, tactical combat, and hack their way through the grid to survive in “The Static Age.” IDENTECO emphasizes much of the social influence and its effect on people through its roleplaying and damage system.
Corporations control almost every facet of life around the world. Everyone from the lowest punk on the fringe to the highest-paid government officials are beholden to the whim of the Corps. Many feel like it’s their only way to make it in the world. Through carefully crafted marketing and slick branding, the Corps don’t “force” their will onto people they “enforce” their worth in people’s minds.
Others see past the fancy graphics and carefully manipulative words to find something they consider more “real.” These people try to live outside the prison the Corps have created for humanity. They inhabit the space between the Corps and the cities. They prefer to survive—and if they’re lucky thrive—in the shadow of the very giants they swore off.
IDENTECO is built on an entirely new D20-based system. Players who are familiar with some of the most-popular fantasy games will understand the base concepts, but will be interested to see how the rules are expanded to a modern setting.

221287.name: VIP System Core Rule Book
221287.description:
Variable Initiative Point Role Playing System

Publisher's blurb:

VIP stands for Variable Initiative Point. The system gets its name because in the VIP System all actions have an initiative point cost. And how you spend these points will directly affect your play order in future rounds. Spend 5 Inititive to swing that warhammer around, and the rogue with the dagger is probably going to be acting before you next round, of course if you hit him with that bad boy... well, he's much less likely to be fighting back.

Conflicts are resolved in Initiative Rounds that last approximately 10 seconds in game time. Each Initiative Round could be made up of any number of Combat Rounds. A combat round is a cycle through every character involved in a given conflict, with each acting in some manner. They may do as much as they want and spend as much of there initiative as they choose but, they must stop as soon as they have to make a roll, or cause damage to any Player or NPC. The next round there initiative order will be determined by their actions this round. This continues until all players and NPC's are reduced to zero or less Initiative. Then everyone rolls initiative again. If you had a negative initiative at the end of the last Initiative Round, the penalty carries over to the new round.

Characters are made up of several factors; Attributes, Skills, Traits, and Effects.

221288.name: The Defence of Athel Loren
221288.description:
A board game originally published in Games Workshop's White Dwarf magazine (2014 issue #14 of White Dwarf)

The Defence of Athel Loren is a simple minigame that uses a Treeman and five Warhammer warriors who seek to despoil the home of the Wood Elves.

There are two players in this game, the Defender and the Despoiler. The object of the game is for the Defender to use his Treeman to kill the Despoiler’s minions before they can reach the Sacred Glade of Athel Loren.

221289.name: Eternal Return
221289.description:
User Summary

Retro style, horror/monster themed platform game. Explore a dark castle and discover its secrets in this story based game.

221291.name: Forma.8
221291.description:
forma.8 is a unique take on the proven Metroidvania action-adventure formula, with a striking visual style and a huge world to explore.

Source: The Developer Website.

221292.name: Go! Go! Kokopolo 3D: Space Recipe for Disaster

221293.name: City Climber
221293.description:
User Summary

Physics based, abstract, indie game where about climbing where you navigate through different environments.

221294.name: A Pixel Story
221294.description:
A Pixel Story is a devious 2D puzzle platformer that charts the evolution of video games. You must use your Magical Teleportation Hat to explore 6 increasingly detailed zones on your quest to reach the core of The System to stop the evil OS and save the world.

Source: The Developer Website.

221295.name: Chime Sharp
221295.description:
Chime was a much-loved music puzzle game on Xbox Live Arcade, PC and PS3. What happens if you file away the rusty edges? New music + new modes + new visuals = CHIME SHARP.

Source: The Game Website.

221296.name: Blackwake
221296.description:
Source: The Game Website.

Blackwake is a naval multiplayer FPS focused on teamwork and cooperation. Fire the cannons, sink enemy ships or board them with firearms and steel.

221297.name: Wizrogue - Labyrinth of Wizardry
221297.description:
User Summary

Fantasy based RPG where you must collect and train characters. Form a party and take on the labyrinths.

221298.name: Newspeak
boardgamepublisher: Inside the Box Board Games LLP (ITB)
221298.description:
A tense game of dystopian subversion, where you take the role of either the 'dissidents' or the 'moderators' in a mind-bending battle of wits to determine the reality around you.

Will you challenge the status quo and shatter your fragile reality or seek to protect the safety of what you know?

Dissidents utilise a matching underground codes to coordinate meetings at one of the disturbingly illustrated locations on your map. They then each secretly use their location dials to declare their intended meeting point.

The Mods, in a short amount of time, then have to determine where they expect the Dissidents to meet by inferring their intent from a book of every possible code set the subversives could use, and agree upon a location to direct a state raiding party.

Once they've agreed on a location, the Dissidents each reveal their location dials. Depending on whether the majority of Dissidents have successfully coordinated at a single location, or the Mods have caught them in an attempt at subversion will determine whether that location becomes 'subverted' or 'improved'.

As the game progresses, subverted locations become more valuable as they become the key to powerful revelations and resources that the Dissidents can use to triumph over the Mods, and improved locations become 'lost', a haven of false utopia inflicted by the watchful citizen mods.

The locations' size, position and state of subversion or oppression dictates the shifting tone of the game. The presence of special subversives uncovered by players, which act as non-player agents within the game also present a thorn in the mods' side, providing increasingly potent abilities the subversives can use to overcome the stifling dystopia.

221300.name: Land It Rocket
221300.description:
User Summary

Land your rocket safely and avoid mines, lasers and turrets. Complete all 28 levels as fast as possible to earn a 3-star rating.

221301.name: Seabed Prelude
221301.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

VR music game in which you will become the captain
of a bathyscaphe. Your mission is to clear the ancient tracks between underwater cities using a mighty weapon of your choice:
a powerful pipe organ or the Tesla coils.

221302.name: Kbyte
221302.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Meet kbyte, ride along with him in his adventure, jumping through worlds full of pixel life.

Indie platformer with cartoon elements.

221304.name: Please
221304.description:
User Summary

1st person horror story game. Solve puzzles and avoid monsters.

221305.name: Polterheist
221305.description:
User Summary

You are a burglar and rob houses at night.

221306.name: Northgard
221306.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: Northgard.
The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods.
That is, if they can survive the dire wolves and undead warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North.

221307.name: Robinson Crusoe and the Cursed Pirates
221307.description:
from Windows CD-ROM cover
1679: Robinson Crusoe has finally escaped his desert island. He sets sail with Friday for Brazil, but within weeks, things have taken a turn for the worse! They reach an uncharted island, only to find it full of crazed pirates, cheeky monkeys and voodoo curses! Can you take on the undead pirates and find a cure for the voodoo curse?

x Over 40 locations to explore
x 20 crazy pirates!
x Pirate IQ Tests®, Turtle Races, Grog competitions and over 30 other minigames!
x And of course, a barrelful of Hidden Obeject fun!

221308.name: Dodge Master
221308.description:
Dodge Master is a high speed test of reflexes that will challenge your dodging ability throughout the experience. You play as a white block that you must guide through a series of levels that will really test your hand-eye coordination skills. Dodge Master features a lot of variety, you could be going through a maze one level while ducking into alcoves to avoid being crushed in the next.

Dodge Master has very simple controls, you use the arrow keys to move your white block side to side while your block will automatically fall downwards. There are many things that augment the core gameplay of Dodge Master such as blocks that bounce you when you hit them and areas that change the direction in which you fall. Dodge Master will include over 50 handcrafted levels for you to enjoy.

Source: The Developer Website.

221309.name: What Time Is It?
221309.description: This well-designed game will get kids up to speed on telling time. Players move the arms on their own clock faces to show the time described on cards. It is especially good for correlating analog and digital representations of time as well as wording like half past and quarter to. Cards are color coded for the progression of skills in learning to tell time; each color representing time to the hour, the half hour, the quarter hour, in five minute intervals or for all sixty minutes. Points are awarded for setting clocks to the correct time, as well as for correcting clocks to the specified time, making playing a reinforcement of time telling skills.

221311.name: Postman Pat's Trail Game
221311.description:
From ZX Spectrum cassette inlay
Join Postman Pat and Jess the Cat in their bright red post office van and drive through the familiar roads of Greendale to track down people and animals.

221312.name: Postman Pat: Package of Fun
221312.description:
From cover
There's lot of fun to be had with Postman Pat, Jess his black and white cat and the other colourful characters who live in Greendale. Postman Pat™ Package of Fun is designed to help children develop easy learning skills whilst having fun.


Remember the moves that your favourite Postman Pat™ characters make on the screen and repeat them in the Memory Game. The better you do the more actions you will have to remember!



In the Pairs Game match either the characters, their hats and faces, or their dance moves - the harder the level the more cards you have to match.



Help Mrs Goggins change the pattern and colour of parcels to match the others on the rack in the Parcel Game. Try to bring a smile to her face by matching up all the parcels correctly.



Feed, water and play with Postman Pat's cat Jess for the day in the Looking after Jess Game. Remember she needs lots of attention. Keep an eye on all the indicators and the clock to make sure you don't miss anything.

221313.name: A Trip to Yugoslavia: Director's Cut
221313.description:
A TRIP TO YUGOSLAVIA is an experimental interactive game with a theme of the old VCR player (with the ability to REWIND, PAUSE and FASTFORWARD).

Yugoslavia has fallen apart. No one knows what caused it. Some people ran away instantly and some of them still don't know that the war has just begun
Including you. You're taking a role of Dimitri, an amateur photographer, who has been caught in the nearby Yugoslavian forest on the outskirts of town. Now, without any combat knowledge, you have to survive a few months of war in a desolated country.

Source: The Developer Website.

221314.name: Postman Pat Activity Centre
221314.description:
From cover
Join Postman Pat, Jess the Cat, and lots of other characters from Greendale in this fun-filled kids activity centre. Packed with exciting games and puzzles for children aged 2-5, it's designed to help children develop early learning skills and fun sumulating way. Each activity has adjustable difficulty levels to keep your child challenged as they progress through the program.

221315.name: Dad Quest
221315.description:
http://dadquestgame.com/ The Developer's Website

A child longs to soar through the sky with the grace of an eagle! But alone they lack the technique to truly fly. Only you (The Dad) posses the throwing arm required to help nurture a child to become the weapon it was always meant to be. Dad Quest combines the 2D action platformer genre with some familiar mechanics found inside RPG games to create an interesting world to explore filled with comedy and a dash of charm.

221316.name: Shadows Of Adam
221316.description:
When you're keeled over, hands on your knees, spitting out the grit that last monster knocked into your teeth, maybe then you'll understand. Shadows of Adam is no walk in the park. It's a new age retro RPG built for the modern era. Challenging battles, cryptic puzzles, and rapid fire plot keep your adrenaline pumping from start to finish in this nostalgia-provoking RPG.

Source: The Developer Website.

221317.name: Postman Pat and the Greendale Rocket
221317.description:
From back of the box
The people of Greendale are sad that the village train station has been abandonned so they deside to restore the old steam train and reopen the station. Join Pat as he sets off in his little red van with his companion Jess the Cat to deliver the mail and help his friends prepare for the grand re-opening anbd the reveiling of the timely rebuilded Greendale Rocket!

221318.name: Whistle Stop
221318.description:
Description from the publisher:

With the driving of the golden spike in 1869, the first transcontinental railroad was completed in the United States — but really it was only the beginning of a rapid expansion of railways that would crisscross the entire country.

In Whistle Stop, you make your way west across the country, using your fledgling railroad company to build routes, pick up valuable cargo, and deliver needed goods to growing towns, creating a network of whistle stops that you and your competitors can leverage as you continue to expand your networks. Along the way, you gain shares in other railroads and watch your reputation soar with each successful delivery before making a final push to complete long hauls to the boom towns of the West.

This design is a new twist on pick-up-and-deliver games. As players move their trains west and pick up goods, they can deliver those goods to small towns to gain shares in railroads, or hold on to them for a bigger payout when they reach the west coast. At the same time, they try to optimize their actions (and gain extra ones), lay down new track tiles, block the other players, gather and use valuable whistles for special moves and abilities, and carefully manage their coal resources.

221319.name: Miner Meltdown
221319.description:
Miner Meltdown is a 2D team-based online competitive multiplayer game. Players must scour the map for minerals, upgrade their gear, and attempt to blow up the opposing team all the while avoiding monsters, traps, and environmental pitfalls along the way. Maps are randomly generated and 100% destructible, so every match is a fully unique, fast-paced, and chaotic affair.

Source: The Developer Website.

221320.name: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
221320.description:
From back of the cover
